```{r}
# Output: FALSE
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
```

```{r}
# Output: FALSE
# Loading the clean dataset
data = read_tsv("../data/annotated_meta_gene_table.tsv")
```

## log2_transformation of data

```{r}

aug_data <- data |>
   mutate(log2_Lesion = 
           if_else(Lesion == 0, 
                   0, 
                   log2(Lesion)
                   )
         ) |> 
   mutate(log2_Perilesion = 
           if_else(Perilesion == 0, 
                   0, 
                   log2(Perilesion)
                   )
         ) |> 
   mutate(log2_expr_change = 
           if_else(expr_diff == 0, 
                   0, 
                   log2(expr_diff)
                   )
         ) 

```

```{r}
# We save the augmented data frame
write_tsv(aug_data, 
          file = "../data/augmented_meta_gene_table.tsv")
```
